Phases.Strategy:
Tanks can pick up the Illuminati Snipers by walking through the tethers.

Keep an eye on where you're standing so you aren't boxed in by Bombs.

Mechanics.Name: Illuminati Sniper
Mechanics.Description: Tethers to a random player and shoots them until it dies. If the player dies, will pick a new target. Walking through the tether will cause it to change targets, allowing the tank to pick up the adds. Spawns additional adds as the fight progresses.

Mechanics.Name: Bombs
Mechanics.Description: Spawns a bomb on the ground somewhere in the arena. Makes a cross shape with 2 long thin line AoEs. Spawns multiple of these at once, with more the longer the fight goes on.

Phases.Strategy:
Any Ceruleum Puddles that overlap will be affected by Oversurge, so avoid standing in them.

Kill the Gliders quickly to lower the damage done by Needle Burst.

Mechanics.Name: Illuminati Glider
Mechanics.Description: Spawns throughout the fight. Has low health, very easy to burn down. Remaining HP affects the damage of Needle Burst.

Mechanics.Name: Ceruleum Puddles / Oversurge
Mechanics.Description: Ceruleum Puddles dropped periodically throughout the fight. Will explode when the boss uses Oversurge while standing in them, and the puddles will chain together.

Phases.Strategy:
Use various AoE abilities to knockback the Bombs during Laps.

Keep an eye on the boss during Giant Bomb so that you know when he is about to charge across the arena.

DPS may opt to LB the Giant Bomb if damage is low or they just want to finish it off quickly.

Mechanics.Name: Laps
Mechanics.Description: The boss will become untargetable and begin making laps around the edge of the arena. Standing in its path will cause the player to take moderate damage and be knocked away.

Mechanics.Name: Adds
Mechanics.Description:
Spawn during Laps.

Illuminati Sniper
	Tethers to a random player, same as the first boss.
Illuminati Soldier
	Attacks players and can be aggroed.

Mechanics.Name: Bombs
Mechanics.Description: Spawn during Laps. Numerous targetable bombs are dropped all around the room. Any damage dealt to them will knock them away from the player. Players should stack in the middle and use various AoEs (both oGCD and GCD) to knock them to the edges of the arena.

Mechanics.Name: Giant Bomb
Mechanics.Description: Spawns towards the end of the fight, after players have dealt with Bombs. During this time, the boss will stop and charge across the center of the arena, dealing damage and knocking players back. Players need to kill the bomb before it explodes; if they fail to do so, the group will wipe.
